summary: The bill, titled the "Forcing Real Accountability for Unlawful Distributions Act of 2025" or the "FRAUD Act of 2025," directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to implement an information technology system to detect fraud, waste, and abuse in claims submitted under the Veterans Community Care Program. This system will analyze claims, monitor for patterns, and generate reports. The Secretary must report annually to Congress on the system's effectiveness and savings. The IT system has a sunset clause.  Funds for the system will come from an existing Veterans Affairs franchise fund.
